question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: Ve které sezóně vyhrál Bursaspor mistrovství Süper Lig?
answer: Bursaspor vyhrál tureckou Süper Lig v sezóně 2009-2010.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Turkish Süper Lig in the 2009-2010 season.
